sub_title: Demand Generation Marketer, Storyteller, Strategist, SaaS Follower, Start-up Lover
summary:
I’m a Growth and Performance Marketer who has an extensive background in digital marketing growth strategies. Having worked both on the client's and agency side, I acquired a 360-degree understanding of online marketing and the international online market. 

I work best in diverse and mission-driven teams and I’m good at building new setups - from devising a department strategy to establishing an action plan, reporting, tooling, and building teams.

With my broad digital skillset, I have had worked with some of the best clients like Dolby, McCormick-Kohinoor, KuCoin globally.

My specialism includes:
✔ Performance Marketing (SEM, SEA, YouTube, Meta, etc.)
✔ Google Analytics, Studio and Tag Manager
✔ Rapid Experimentation via A/B Testing and Customer Feedback Loops
✔ Full-Funnel Conversion Rate Optimization
✔ Drip Marketing
✔ Influencer Marketing
✔ Stakeholder management 
✔ Implemented several SaaS/Technology/Tag Management providers

Of course, on a human-to-human level, my intellectual curiosity drives me to be a lifelong learner. When I am not managing and growing accounts, you’ll find me reading, trying new gadgets, travelling, vlogging and drinking coffee.  

Feel free to reach out with any questions! I’d be delighted to help!

awards.title: Additional Honors & Awards
awards.description:
# Worked as a Student Researcher for Technische Universitat Chemnitz.
# Worked as a Marketing and Outreach Evangelist for InnoSync (Aautosync Innovations’ bimonthly magazine).
# Worked with Aautosync Innovations as an Marketing Evangelist. 
#  Actively participate in group discussions and workshop activities in British Council.
# Marketing Head for Team Lakshya’s Formula Student Division, which stood 5th in Asia and 29th Worldwide in Business Presentation at SAE Formula Student Italy in 2014.
# Marketing Head for Team Lakshya's Formula Student Division, which stood 39th Worldwide in Cost Event out of 111 teams at IMechE Formula Student U.K. in 2016.
# Honored by Nokia for support their campaign (GO GREEN) at PEC University of Technology.
# Participated in various robotics competitions.
# Won 1st prize in Litmus Quiz held in Chitkara University.
# Elected Campus Ambassador from IIT Delhi & IIT Jodhpur, PEC University of Technology, UIET, and Thapar University for the year 2013-14
# Won 2nd prize in Arena 51 (Line follower - Robotics competition) at NIT Jalandhar during TecNITi'13
# Worked as an Editor for Resonance Magazine (Annual College Magazine).
# Did an internship as a marketing intern at SITCO LLC which I completed in April 2012


Magazines/newspapers coverage

# Was featured in Hindustan Times Chandigarh’s page for Commendable research in the field of fire alarm (March 17,2013)
# Was featured in Times of India Chandigarh’s main page Commendable research in the field of fire alarm (March 17,2013)
# Was featured in Times of India Chandigarh’s page for Commendable research in the field of Piezoelectric (May 16,2013)

projects.title: Team Lakshya - Formula Student Division
projects.description:
The Mission of Formula Student is to excite and encourage young people to take up a career in engineering. It seeks to challenge university students to conceive, design, build, cost, present and compete as a team with a small single-seat racing car in a series of static and dynamic competitions. The format of the event is such that it provides an ideal opportunity for the students to demonstrate and improve their capabilities to deliver a complex and integrated product in the demanding environment of a motorsport competition.

The supply chain management is unique in Formula Student. I applied classroom theories into practice but also develop an understanding in key business aspects including project management, teamwork, presentation skills.

I was sole responsible for product launches, and sponsorship.

projects.title: InnoSync
projects.description:
InnoSync is an Innovation & Research driven Magazine and an endeavor of Aautosync Innovations to unleash new ideas that inspire new creations. The right tool to help you explore a new passion. It features, extensively six inspiring sectors:
# Automotive
# Informatics
# Bioengineering 
# Renewable Energy
# Reverse Engineering
# Technical Events
InnoSync is a projection of what Aautosync Innovations has witnessed so far and the times to come. It is imagination meeting innovation which is brought into actual existence. We don't believe in categorizing our readers, we just love to spread ideas bundled in six sectors to foster the strength to thoughts which do not like to remain in a box.

April 4th, 2015 witnessed the Global launch of InnoSync : Automotive Edition through the hands of Ex-Union Minister of India.

Sole Responsible for implementing the marketing strategy for the magazine.
My main responsibilities included:
• Budget management and sponsorship.
• Ensured consistent and accurate brand voice.
• Created exciting and engaging content for the magazine.
• Ensured all projects comply with Aautosync Innovations editorial standards.

profile_positions.description:
Worked as a growth marketer in the crypto ecosystem (exchanges, protocols, metaverse, and NFTs) to deliver the best growth strategies and experiences to clients across the globe.

Collaborated with the in-house content marketing and social media teams; built a strong relationship which helped us achieve the following growth metrics:
- Increased Sugarbounce's token value post-IDO by 300% and their followers base on Twitter by 583% through influencer marketing and PR initiatives
- Increased MaticVerse's engagement rate on Twitter by x2 and Telegram community growth by 50% through giveaways, community-building activities and introducing content buckets to avoid repetitive content on their socials
profile_positions.title: Growth Manager

profile_positions.description:
Devised account plans for 10+ global clients such as Dolby, McCormick-Kohinoor, etc. on biddable media (SEM, GDN, YouTube, Facebook, etc.) for their advertising campaigns.

Account and Client Management:
- Achieved ~8% absolute lift over a period of 1 month for McCormick Kohinoor's Tasty Twist, while the industry benchmark is ~5%
- Reduced cost per lead to 1/3 and increased conversion rate by 2 times for multiple brands by doing A/B testing
- Achieving an incremental reach of 20 Mn+ users (2x increase with the same budget) for Dolby in the SEA region via targeted communications & audience segregation
- Optimising user funnel journey for various brands by understanding dropoff at every stage of the funnel and optimising it by channel

Leadership and People Management:
- Managed and grown SEO department as wholesome media approach
- Mentored 2 interns by training them on biddable platforms and client protocol
profile_positions.title: Senior Media Executive

profile_positions.description:
Building BIS into a brand using digital marketing strategies by translating our (component-groups’ or team’s) market intelligence into stakeholder’s comprehension, offering insights for measurable actions.

Built the engagement funnels to bolster email deliverability to ~99% and achieved an open rate of ~25%.

Increased website traffic through handheld devices from 10% to 50% via Social Media.

Created and delivered thought leadership content (i.e. whitepapers, webinars, blogs) to influence customers, buyers, industry specialists, research analysts, key editors in the press and other third parties.

Provided product and market expertise for global events such as conferences, trade shows and webinars.

Helped in improving digital marketing skills, team management skills, strategic planning and event management.
profile_positions.title: Senior Executive - Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Increased customer base or account base – Broke existing partnership – Retained and grew existing accounts across the AMER and EMEA using excellent communication skills, diligence, organised meeting- strong follow-up through e-mails and voice & video calls and sharp attention to detail.

Built a $61,625 pipeline to sales management.

Conducted presentations over the phone with Directors and CEOs working in deep technologies and demonstrated a highly polished, professional and consultative selling style.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Mentored 6 students for social projects; Up Our Streets: Sparkhill Projects Crowdfunding, GP/wellbeing. 

Curated and supervised upon a soft training plan with a teacher-coordinator and students.

Provided biweekly valuable feedback on the job performance of students.
profile_positions.title: Business Mentor (Careers Network- Innovation)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for creating a survey after assisting faculty members in developing new promotional and marketing campaign for socks manufactured to control after effects of diabetes.

profile_positions.description:

Promoted brand’s growth across all mediums.

Managed organisation’s marketing operations, covering all aspects including brand journey, collateral, creative development, hospitality, logistics, merchandise, planning, budget management, sponsorship and product development.

Direct liaison with Aautosync’s partners and sponsors.

volunteer_experiences.description: Elected as an Experience Officer and provided proposals to consider a revision of the ‘Ideas’ to be taken forward into the process to advance the experience of 34,000 university students.
